title: 1999 44’ Great Dane Refrigerated Semi Truck Trailer (Contents NOT Included)
item_description:
1999 44’ Great Dane Refrigerated Semi Truck Trailer (Contents NOT Included)

Trailer Details

  • Year: 1999
  • Make: Great Dane
  • Model: 7011TZ-1 48
  • VIN: 1GRAA962XXB162124
  • License: 4HX6520
    • Expiration Date:  2/28/2022
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 68,000 Lbs

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 576”
  • Overall Width: 101”
  • Overall Height: 156”
  • Deck Length: 575”
  • Deck Width: 100”
  • Side Height: 105”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Number of Wheels: 8
  • Tire Size: 295/75R22.5
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Removal Note: This lot is only available for removal on Friday, February 21, 2025, from 9:00AM to 3:30PM. Earlier removal of this lot will not be permitted. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of removal of this lot. No loading assistance or assistance of any kind will be provided by West Auctions. Please bid accordingly.

Note: Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, and Due Diligent Effort for registered owner paperwork will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
